00046 void pizNeuralGasSetLambda (PIZNeuralGas *x, long n)
00047 {
00048     x->lambda = MAX (n, 1);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void pizNeuralGasSetEpsilon1 (PIZNeuralGas *x, double f)
00052 {
00053     if (f > 0. && f < 1.) {
00054             x->epsilon1 = f;
00055         }
00056 }
00057 
00058 void pizNeuralGasSetEpsilon2 (PIZNeuralGas *x, double f)
00059 {
00060     if (f > 0. && f < 1.) {
00061             x->epsilon2 = f;
00062         }
00063 }
00064 
00065 void pizNeuralGasSetAlpha (PIZNeuralGas *x, double f)
00066 {
00067     if (f > 0. && f < 1.) {
00068             x->alpha = f;
00069         }
00070 }
00071 
00072 void pizNeuralGasSetBeta (PIZNeuralGas *x, double f)
00073 {
00074     if (f > 0. && f < 1.) {
00075             x->beta = f;
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 void pizNeuralGasSetKappa (PIZNeuralGas *x, double f)
00080 {
00081     if (f > 0.) {
00082             x->kappa = f;
00083         }
00084 }

00086 long pizNeuralGasLambda (const PIZNeuralGas *x)
00087 {
00088     return (x->lambda);
00089 }

00118 
00119 PIZError pizNeuralGasEncodeToArray (const PIZNeuralGas *x, long n, PIZGrowingArray *a)
00120 {
00121     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00122     
00123     if ((n >= 0) && (n < x->mapSize) && a) {
00124         long i;
00125         long k = 0;
00126         
00127         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00128         
00129         for (i = 0; i < PIZ_ITEMSET128_SIZE; i++) {
00130             if (pizItemset128IsSetAtIndex (&x->map, i)) {
00131                 if (k == n) {
00132                     long j;
00133                     
00134                     for (j = 0; j < x->vectorSize; j++) {
00135                         err |= pizGrowingArrayAppend 
00136                             (a, (long)(((*(x->vectorStock + (n * x->vectorSize) + j)) + 0.5)));
00137                         }
00138                     }
00139                 
00140                 k ++;
00141             }
00142         }
00143     }
00144     
00145     return err;
00146 }
